trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Trout Lake
There were no other sightings in Trout Lake on or around July 4th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAttending the 2008 ECETI Conference with a crowd of people 'sky watching' and looking for ships in the sky. A number of star-like object zipped across the sky at different times; however, one of them 'powered up' their lights to show itself to the crowd below. The lights came on for maybe 3 seconds or so, which made the object seem to show itself to be a huge oval-shaped ship of some type that was zooming across the sky in a northerly direction. There were numerous such sightings at night during the three day conference and three that powered up their lights to show themselves to the crowd. Understand that a few folks in the crowd had green laser pens, and were flashing a pattern to the shipsas they coursed across the sky. Out of all the ships that zipped across the sky, only about three powered up their lights. I am a MUFON Field Investigator, Floridia Division, who has attended two conferences at James Gilliland's Ranch in Trout Lake, WA (2007 and 2008). This was the first time I saw objects respond to people on the ground by turning on their lights to show themselves.
Summary: Star-like object zipped across sky and powered up its lights to beam us
